attributes.action: To reduce the student loan interest rate to be in proportion to the reduction in Bank interest rate reduction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the credit crunch , help is being given to many different sectors, and students need assistance too.  It is crucial to help students (The next genereation) who have left university to not accrue more debt.  With the cut in the bank interest rate, the student is paying more and their interest rate should be cut as the bank interest rate has been, and be proportionally lower than the bank interest rate, as previously.  Please reduce this as soon as possible.
